title: Lowell National Historical Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Lowell National Historical Park is situated in the midst of downtown Lowell. This central location allows you to conveniently visit many cultural sites and historic scenes throughout the city. Begin your visit at the National Park Visitor Center, 246 Market Street, to discover the full range of programs, activities, museums, and adventures awaiting you in your explorations of Lowell.  Â      2016 Winter-Spring Lowell Offering nps  Your Guide to Winter - Spring 2016 Download the 2016 Winter-Spring Lowell Offering, your Lowell map and guide to tour schedules, exhibit opening times, and special events.
